data.comment: The first-half is under way at John Smith's Stadium - Middlesbrough kick-off to start the match.
Marvin Johnson scores to make it 0-1 at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 29, Carlos Corberan is making the team's first substitution at John Smith's Stadium with Rarmani Edmonds-Green replacing Richard Stearman.
Carel Eiting is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Fraizer Campbell is on target to give Huddersfield a 2-1 advantage.
The second half is underway in Huddersfield - Huddersfield with the kick-off.
Paddy McNair (Middlesbrough) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 65, Middlesbrough's Jonny Howson has been booked in Huddersfield.
Fraizer Campbell (Huddersfield) has received a first yellow card.
Middlesbrough make their first substitution with Chuba Akpom replacing Marcus Tavernier.
In the minute 68, Juninho Bacuna (Huddersfield) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
Anfernee Dijksteel is booked for the away team.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a second substitution, with Demeaco Duhaney replacing Juninho Bacuna.
In the minute 77, Danny Ward is replacing Fraizer Campbell for Huddersfield at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 84, Middlesbrough have been awarded a penalty in Huddersfield...
Naby Sarr (Huddersfield) has received a first yellow card.
Britt Assombalonga equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
Josh Koroma puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
Duncan Watmore is on a sub for Anfernee Dijksteel for Middlesbrough.
In the minute 89, The home team replace Josh Koroma with Aaron Rowe.
Jaden Brown is replacing Isaac Mbenza for the home team.
The away team have replaced George Saville with Lewis Wing. This is the third substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
John Brooks blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
